title: Man on the Inside (feat. Josh Adam Meyers)
description:
Josh Adam Meyers joins the Bonfire tells tales of a virus eye while trying to see the Feldog's 222 concert at The Whiskey in Los Angeles. 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
